title: WTB: T206s with tough backs in high grades
author: CMIZ5290

posts.post_title: WTB: T206s with tough backs in high grades
posts.post_content: Really looking hard for 7's (I know it's a needle in a haystack!), Pied 42's, Sov. 460's, Tolstoi's, Car. Brights, Cycles, Polar Bears, AB's, etc... PSA or SGC graded. Willing to offer top dollar if anyone has one...thanks

Kevin- wish i knew you about 5 years ago...i had most of the above mentioned backs in PSA 7 or 8, as well as some strong mid-grades on the tuffer ones (Lenox, Uzit, Drum, etc). i sold them all, and have since rebuilt a respectable back set...but not high-grade this time around. i am sure those cards i used to have are put away in various vaults by now, not to see the light of day for awhile ;)

good luck in your search!
